title: Inheritance
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
Deriving new class from old. 
Reusability. 
`class Dog : public Animal`.
Diamond Problem in Multiple Inheritance.

common_mistakes.correction: Private members are NOT inherited (invisible to child). Use Protected.

interview_questions.question: What is Diamond Problem?
interview_questions.answer: A->B, A->C, D inherits B and C. D has two copies of A. Solved using Virtual Inheritance (`class B : virtual public A`).
